      • setIntegrator

        public void setIntegrator(IntegratorHarmonic i)
        Sets the integrator for the device. Adds actions to the device's controller to inform the integrator when the wavevector # and "All Wave Vectors"/"One Wave Vector" selection has changed based upon the type of integrator passed in.
        Parameters:
        i - Integrator
